General.Name: Ningxia Jiaze Renewables Corp
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Ningxia Jiaze Renewables Corporation Limited invests in, constructs, develops, operates, and manages energy projects. It operates wind power, photovoltaic, solar power, source-grid-load-storage smart micro-grid zero-carbon parks, energy storage power stations, pumped storage, and other power stations. As of December 31, 2022, the company has an installed capacity of 1,926MW, including 1,853MW of wind power grid, 67MW of photovoltaic power generation, and 6MW of smart microgrid power generation. It also engages in the roof distributed photovoltaic business; provision of post-power station service, power trading, green power trading, carbon asset trading, and energy management services, as well as production, operation, and maintenance for energy power generation companies; and corporate fund business. The company was formerly known as Ningxia Jiaze Power Generation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningxia Jiaze Renewables Corporation Limited in August 2015. Ningxia Jiaze Renewables Corporation Limited was founded in 2010 and is based in Yinchuan, China.
